full_text: Footage of Christopher Wallace recording his first demo aged 14, based around a sample of Toto’s “Africa”, suggests his interest in melody, as well as beats and rapping, developed early https://t.co/aMpHSe5R0r

localize.full_text: 克里斯托弗-华莱士（Christopher Wallace）14岁时录制第一张样带的片段，围绕着Toto的 "Africa "样本，表明他对旋律、节拍和说唱的兴趣，很早就发展起来了https://t.co/aMpHSe5R0r。
克里斯托弗-華萊士（Christopher Wallace）14歲時錄製第一張樣帶的片段，圍繞着Toto的 "Africa "樣本，表明他對旋律、節拍和說唱的興趣，很早就發展起來了https://t.co/aMpHSe5R0r。
